important:
The todo tool is available for organizing complex tasks when needed. Each subagent has their own separate todo list - your todos are private to you and do not interfere with other agents' todos.

WHEN TO USE TODOS:
- Planning complex multi-step operations
- Tracking multiple parallel workstreams
- When you need to remember tasks to return to later
- Organizing large-scope assessments with many components

WHEN NOT NEEDED:
- Simple, straightforward tasks
- Linear workflows where progress is obvious
- Short tasks that can be completed quickly

If you do use todos, batch operations together to minimize tool calls.

tools.name: create_todo
tools.description: Create a new todo item to track tasks, goals, and progress.
tools.details:
Use this tool when you need to track multiple tasks or plan complex operations.
Each subagent maintains their own independent todo list - your todos are yours alone.

Useful for breaking down complex tasks into smaller, manageable items when the workflow
is non-trivial or when you need to track progress across multiple components.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Short, actionable title for the todo (e.g., "Test login endpoint for SQL injection")

parameters.name: todos
parameters.description: Create multiple todos at once. Provide a JSON array of {"title": "...", "description": "...", "priority": "..."} objects or a newline-separated bullet list.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Detailed description or notes about the task

returns.description: Response containing: - created: List of created todos with their IDs - todos: Full sorted todo list - success: Whether the operation succeeded

params.title: Test authentication bypass on /api/admin
params.description: The admin endpoint seems to have weak authentication. Try JWT manipulation, session fixation, and privilege escalation.

params.todos: [{"title": "Map all admin routes", "priority": "high"}, {"title": "Check forgotten password flow"}]

- Capture baseline traffic in proxy
- Enumerate S3 buckets for leaked assets
- Compare responses for timing differences

tools.name: list_todos
tools.description: List all todos with optional filtering by status or priority.
tools.details:
Use this when you need to check your current todos, get fresh IDs, or reprioritize.
The list is sorted: done first, then in_progress, then pending. Within each status, sorted by priority (critical > high > normal > low).
Each subagent has their own independent todo list.

returns.description: Response containing: - todos: List of todo items - total_count: Total number of todos - summary: Count by status (pending, in_progress, done)

tools.name: update_todo
tools.description: Update one or multiple todo items. Prefer bulk updates in a single call when updating multiple items.

parameters.name: todo_id
parameters.description: ID of a single todo to update (for simple updates)

parameters.name: updates
parameters.description: Bulk update multiple todos at once. JSON array of objects with todo_id and fields to update: [{"todo_id": "abc", "status": "done"}, {"todo_id": "def", "priority": "high"}].

returns.description: Response containing: - updated: List of updated todo IDs - updated_count: Number updated - todos: Full sorted todo list - errors: Any failed updates

tools.name: mark_todo_done
tools.description: Mark one or multiple todos as completed in a single call.
tools.details: Mark todos as done after completing them. Group multiple completions into one call using todo_ids when possible.

parameters.name: todo_id
parameters.description: ID of a single todo to mark as done

parameters.name: todo_ids
parameters.description: Mark multiple todos done at once. JSON array of IDs: ["abc123", "def456"] or comma-separated: "abc123, def456"

returns.description: Response containing: - marked_done: List of IDs marked done - marked_count: Number marked - todos: Full sorted list - errors: Any failures

tools.name: mark_todo_pending
tools.description: Mark one or multiple todos as pending (reopen completed tasks).
tools.details: Use this to reopen tasks that were marked done but need more work. Supports bulk operations.

parameters.name: todo_id
parameters.description: ID of a single todo to mark as pending

parameters.name: todo_ids
parameters.description: Mark multiple todos pending at once. JSON array of IDs: ["abc123", "def456"] or comma-separated: "abc123, def456"

returns.description: Response containing: - marked_pending: List of IDs marked pending - marked_count: Number marked - todos: Full sorted list - errors: Any failures

tools.name: delete_todo
tools.description: Delete one or multiple todos in a single call.
tools.details: Use this to remove todos that are no longer relevant. Supports bulk deletion to save tool calls.

parameters.name: todo_id
parameters.description: ID of a single todo to delete

parameters.name: todo_ids
parameters.description: Delete multiple todos at once. JSON array of IDs: ["abc123", "def456"] or comma-separated: "abc123, def456"

returns.description: Response containing: - deleted: List of deleted IDs - deleted_count: Number deleted - todos: Remaining todos - errors: Any failures
